thread.section_title: Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Makeover a total success
thread.title_full: Makeover a total success - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Lisa A
title: Makeover a total success
text:
It had been more than a year since I last stayed at this Hyatt, which was getting rather run-down.
Last month I had the pleasant surprise to find the hotel has received a thorough face lift.
The lobby check-in area is tastefully calm and welcoming, and the room and bathroom fittings were excellent.
Very impressed, and now on par with other top-end Grand Hyatt hotels.
Room Tip: Request a room overlooking the atrium, or away from the Highway 101 side of the hotel. See more room tips
